name: Orbit Explorer
description:
Harness the forces of the 'verse!

How long can you send your probe flying through the orbits of the solar system?
Use the planets' gravitational fields to flip through space like the madman that you are.
But try not to crash into them too much. Also, how about not leaving the solar system? Them probes cost money, you know?

Race through space in this sweet, addicting mini game and share your trips with friends!

How to play:
1) Aim your probe in the direction of launch.
2) Tap “Launch”
3) Try not to hit planets during your travel. While flying, tap to active the afterburners in the direction of your tap!

Ready to go? Shiny!
See you on the other side.
